sentences.sContent: Green teas are mostly from China or Japan.
sentences.sCn: 绿茶主要来自中国或日本。

sentences.sContent: There were about fifteen people in the lounge, mostly women.
sentences.sCn: 大厅里大约有15人，大部分是女性。

sentences.sContent: He blamed his parents. Mostly he blamed his dad.
sentences.sCn: 他责怪他的父母，主要是责怪他爸爸。

words.tran: 大部分的，多数的；最多的

trans.tranCn: 主要地； 通常； 几乎全部地， 多半
trans.tranOther: used to talk about most members of a group, most occasions, most parts of something etc
